name: Lemmings Are Crazy
description:
Grab the craft with your finger and try to save all Crazy Lemmings that you can!
Crazy rodents is a highly addictive game where you control a life craft to bounce the crazy rodents to safety as they jump of the cliff.
Grab the craft with your finger and try to save all crazy Lemmings that you can!

Product feature bullets:
• very fun game for kids and babies
• very very easy to play
• nice 2D graphics
• endless game
• cool music sound effects
• amazing animations
• Baby quite game
